ai-tha-ap123:1.1_0: “While staying in the middle of a lake,
ai-tha-ap123:1.2_0: a master of the three Vedas:
ai-tha-ap123:1.3_0: While standing in the open air,
ai-tha-ap123:1.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap123:2.1_0: like a lion, like a lion,
ai-tha-ap123:3.2_0: I threw a stone down in the sky,
ai-tha-ap123:3.3_0: by the power of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap123:4.4_0: and they spent the day in no long time.
ai-tha-ap123:6.4_0: of the Holy One in the world,
ai-tha-ap123:7.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap123:7.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap123:8.2_0: A group of five hundred eons
ai-tha-ap123:9.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap123:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Seyyasaka.
